metadata.title: Intravenous Anakinra for Macrophage Activation Syndrome May Hold Lessons for Treatment of Cytokine Storm in the Setting of Coronavirus Disease 2019

body_text.text: Dr. Wampler Muskardin drafted the article, revised it critically for important intellectual content, and approved the final version to be published.
